title: Liu awaiting spring
creator_credit: Nadine Umback, New South Wales Film and Television Office, Over Exposed Productions and Andrew Soo
brief_description: Set against traditional Chinese music and imagery such as calligraphy and performance art a young gay Chinese man faces the dilemma of “coming out” to his family. His dilemma is complicated by the fact that one of their relatives has died from AIDS.
creator_credit_for_label: Nadine Umback, New South Wales Film and Television Office, Over Exposed Productions and Andrew Soo
